prompt:
Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. I understand its value to you stands at $10000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $11500. This price not only reflects its high quality but also provides you with a reasonable saving compared to its market value. I believe this offer will be mutually beneficial and allow you to experience the full potential of our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
